com.google.wave.api
Interface RobotServlet

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRobot, AbstractRobotServlet
public interface RobotServlet

An interface for processing Robot events.

Author:
scovitz@google.com (Seth Covitz), mprasetya@google.com (Marcel Prasetya)

Method Summary
 void processEvents(RobotMessageBundle events)
          The main event loop for a Robot.
 

Method Detail

processEvents

void processEvents(RobotMessageBundle events)
The main event loop for a Robot. The robot will process the set of events as a whole or one by one. Each event contains the Wavelet, Blips and Documents that are affected. More context and content are provided for an event depending on the settings in the Capabilities XML configuration. Modifications to the Wavelet, Blips and Documents attached to an event will generate operations that are transmitted back to the Wave Robot Proxy and applied to the original Wave as intended.

Parameters:
events - The set of events to be processed.
